text: I'm here on the Midgar Expressway.
The scene is indescribable. Countless buildings have been leveled, and part of the road has collapsed.

The smoke rising from the rubble is...
reminiscent of a funeral pyre.

Of course, this is only the most recent
in a series of crises.

Multiple reactor bombings,
followed by the fall of the─
the fall of the Sector 7 plate...
caused by a massive tornado, which swept through Sectors 0, 1, and 2.

After a briefing with Shinra investigators,
Mayor Domino released a statement...

declaring the tornado to be, quote,
"weather warfare...

"perpetrated by the infamous insurgent group
known as Avalanche."
The administration also suspects the involvement of Wutai─and has begun investigations into the matter.
Boy, that tornado really did a number on the city.
I thought another reactor blew up.
Which musta been caused by the tornado!
Man, when it rains, it pours.
Of course, this is only the most recent in a series of crises.
Multiple reactor bombings, followed by the fall of the─
caused by a massive tornado, which swept through Sectors 0, 1, and 2.
As you can see... Ah, over there!
Amidst the wreckage of the expressway, search and rescue operations are already in progress.
We still have one suspect unaccounted for.

Ex-SOLDIER, armed with a buster sword.
Highly dangerous.

I repeat: the fugitive is an ex-SOLDIER,
armed with a buster sword.
The rescue team has pulled people from the rubble!

Targets have been secured.
We are exfilling via helo now.
The survivors are being taken away!
I think they're headed for Sector 5!
You just don't know when to quit, do you!?
Could ya look after my friend? Just for a bit?
Too much mako─but he'll be fine.
A helo transporting Avalanche HVTs is down!
All nearby units, secure the crash site immediately! Do not let them escape!
Be advised: an ex-SOLDIER is working with Avalanche.
Target is armed with a buster sword.
You are cleared to engage any perceived threats.
Make sure that mutt's not a problem.
Protect the Ancient! Recovering her is our top priority!
HQ, this is Echo, requesting backup! One bird is grounded and we are engaged with the enemy!
Crash site is just outside the Sector 5 gate! Send all available units ASAP!

Deploying secondary force,
but additional units needed!

Attention, Avalanche!
Stand down or we will use lethal force!
Heads are gonna roll if we don't find her.
Just shut the hell up and search!
But I'm back now, Aerith. I'm back.
I'm going to take her home.

Now slow down. I've been to your place.
Shinra's got it staked out.

Not anymore.
They have bigger things to worry about.
And I can't leave her with you.

'Course you can. Just look at Cloud!
I've been taking care of─
Look at the state you've left her in.
You didn't even wipe her face, for goodness sake!

Your note had me worried, and now that I'm here...
I can see that I was right to be concerned.
I brought a wheelchair for Aerith. But if Cloud's coming too, you'll just have to carry him.
At least, that's what everyone's saying.
Sorry, man. Feel like I failed you.
Didn't peg you as a bookworm.

Huh, never seen materia like this before.
Something about the color...
Would you care to join us?
No, you're s'posed to say it now.
Hey, did someone come by the house last night?
He was just dropping off some food.
Then what's with the sneaking around?
You've seen those wanted posters all over town? Well, his face is on them.
So long as Marlene's here, he'll come around again.
Biggs isn't coming back. Tifa isn't coming back. Daddy isn't coming back!
Sure they will. And I know just how to prove it to you.
I'll go 'n' get Biggs. Right now.
Lemme guess, you don't like dumb rhymes.
Hey there. You seen anyone who looks like this?
Does this guy look familiar to you?
Seen anyone around here who looks like this?
I'm sorry, but I don't know who that is.

So there I am, on the ground, bleeding out,
watching everything go dark...
thinking, "This is it. This is how it ends."
Suddenly, the wind picks up outta nowhere.

Tugs at me so hard, it feels like it's
tearing my soul right outta my body.
Next thing I know, I'm back in the orphanage.

But nobody can tell me who found me
or how I got there. It's a miracle.
Sounds like what happened to me.
Whole freakin' army unloading on my position...

One minute I'm outnumbered, and the next─
I'm alone.
None of it makes any sense.

I somehow manage to beat
the odds and wake up here.
Why in the hell did fate pick me?

Their luck runs out but mine doesn't?
I'm the only one who gets a pass?
And now that it's just me, what am I supposed to do? Y'know?
Mako poisoning's done a real number on him. Doubt he's in for a speedy recovery, either.
If he does recover, you can bet your ass he'll act like it was nothing.
Shrug it off and say he's been through ten times that shit.
Are we talking about the same Cloud?
Come on! The guy's desperate to prove himself.
Not like he needs to. Everyone knows he's a bona fide badass.
Hey, why don't you try picking up some work as a merc? A "Zack-of-all-trades."
"The destruction of Sector 7 was orchestrated by Shinra themselves. We can't let those murderers get away with it!
"People of Midgar, fight back against our corporate oppressors by joining Avalanche!
"Seek us out at the lot off Petal Lane."

These guys are setting a trap for themselves!
Shinra'll just roll in and round 'em all up!

Doubt Public Security will even
bother going through the motions.
Easier just to shoot and skip the paperwork.

But idiots are what we need right now─
folks who'll risk it all.
The things I do for friends...
Hey... You ever wondered about your purpose in life? What you're doin' here?
Sure...from time to time... Or...all the time.
Didn't used to, but things changed. Went through a lot after I joined Shinra─like, a lot.
I bet. I ask 'cause ever since I woke up, I've been wondering about what to do with all this time I've been given.
You said before I oughta try "pickin' up some work as a merc"...
"'Cause one's not enough." So who's the "one"?
Cloud. He didn't tell you? Must not've wanted the competition.
When exactly did you meet Cloud?
The day before we hit Reactor 1, so...
Uh... How long ago was that again?
Yeah, mine too... What's that about, anyway?
I think I prefer bein' number two or three. Suits me much better.
Like, the guy who only has to worry about the how, and doesn't have to decide on the what.
Exactly. I'm no hero. So how come I was the one who got saved?
'Cause someone needs you─you and your can-do attitude.
Uh... Whoever brought you back, I guess?
And assuming there was someone, who could it have been?
It's just up ahead. Keep your eyes peeled.
Well, at least Shinra was a no-show too, right?
As if I'd ever join Avalanche!
I just came to see what kinda morons would fall for your dumb-ass propaganda, that's all!
But I should've known. Nobody could be that stupid.
I told you I wasn't cut out for a leading role.

And here I thought I might've been saved
for a reason. Some higher purpose.
It's up to us to find our own purpose.
I mean, who says it's gotta be one way?
Everyone's sitting back, acting like the world's doomed, but the future's not set in stone.
So long as we don't lose sight of what's important...

Y'know, what matters most of all
when the going gets tough...

I dunno─hopes? Dreams, maybe?
Something like that!

So long as we've got those─
and hold on tight and never let go.
Like...like, your life depends on it!
The world's lucky to have you.

Anyway, I gotta run. I'll be sure to
pay a visit to Cloud when I get the chance.
Guess I should prob'ly head home too.
Guess who I just saw? Biggs!
Did he say anything about Daddy or Tifa?
Oh, uh... Sorry, forgot to ask.
Zack, would you mind checking on Aerith for me?

We're all headed for the same place.
You'll see your daddy and Tifa again.
The wind─that was you, wasn't it?
Cloud's all yours. I'll take care of Aerith after.
Aerith sure does sleep a lot, huh?
Please...you gotta make Cloud get better. You gotta.
I mean, I'd love to, but...
You, uh...you said it's better for Aerith to stay asleep 'cause Cloud's sick. Why's that?
she'll die if she wakes up.
You think? What makes you say that?
When she wakes up, a scary man is gonna kill her.

Cloud tries to save her,
but he doesn't make it in time.
He almost does, but he doesn't!

She likes Cloud, so she's happy he came.
Really, really happy.

That's why you have to make Cloud better.
If he's sick, he can't save Aerith!

Marlene...
are you sure you didn't just have a bad dream?

Don't worry, I believe you.
With everything that's going on, how could I not?
Just one question. If it's alright.
Can you tell me what the scary man looked like? Please?
Do you think this means she's going to wake up?

Hey, Elmyra...I've gotta go away for a bit.
Need to talk to someone about Cloud.
Well hurry on back, okay? It's hard enough looking after these two with your help─but without it...?
Without you, I'd be a wreck.

Don't worry, I'm going by bike.
Shouldn't take long.
Just...keep an eye on 'em while I'm gone, okay?

Oh, and if Aerith does wake up,
please don't let her leave.

No promises.
That girl's snuck out more times than I can count.
Make sure that you're back by dinner.
I hope that Biggs will come to visit us soon...

"I thought about what you said.
Couldn't stop thinking about it, actually."

'Bout how it's up to each of us
to find our own purpose in life.
'Cause in Avalanche, I think I've found mine.
We don't have a whole lotta time...
Do yourself a favor and steer clear of Reactor 6.
No... I didn't─ That's not what I meant!
Tseng is in grave condition... Perhaps I could help?
No. The medical team will see to him.
Tell me, Professor: how would you explain the phenomena we witnessed at the temple?
It would be premature to draw any scientific conclusions...but one thing is abundantly clear:
we at Shinra could stand to dream far bigger.
Where Hojo should be─along with a cure for Cloud.

which'll get blown up, along with Biggs,
unless I stop him.
Does Aerith... Does she have feelings for Cloud?
Hang in there, Cloud. I got you.

Time's a-wastin', Cloud,
and it's not like we have much left!
Let's just call it a dream.
Just play along for a bit, okay?
You have to promise not to look up.
'Cause I'm pretty sure you won't like what ya see.
You know I'm gonna have to look now, right?

There I go...putting my foot in my mouth.
When will I ever learn?
Can I have one? Can I, can I, can I!?
Why are you acting so weird?
If you ask me, I'd probably say, uh...this piece?

I dunno...
Actually! I'm gonna let him choose.

Everything is free, but remember,
it's one per person.
This is it! After much cajoling, Cloud is about to give his very first gift to Aerith!
Only question is─which one will he choose!?
Ah, I'm so sorry! I meant everything but that one.

Tell you what.
I've got something else I think you'll love!
I'll miss these moments. Thank you both.

It's your lucky day, you two.
Feel free to take whatever you'd like.
Ah! But only one per person.
Then I'll have one of those!

Though these aren't the only treats
I've got, you know. How about...
Figured I'd pull out all the stops for my last hurrah.
Guess I pulled out one too many.
No, it just...needs a little sugar, maybe.

Yeah...
and take out whatever's making my tongue tingle.
It sounds to me like I need to start over.
If only we all had more time, am I right?
Pretty sure I only asked to meet with Professor Hojo.
Whatever. The world's about to end anyway.
Got nothin' to lose...and everything to gain!
So this is where you've been hiding─
In a world that has accepted its fate.
Sorry, folks! I've only got one shot left.
Okay, um... How about you all pose?
Cutest-looking couple gets their photo taken.
Smile real big for the camera now!

Pump's still suckin' away,
but the only thing it's pulling up is dirt.

Bomb one reactor, bomb 'em all─
planet's done either way.

Bomb barely made it through testing.
Figures it'd fail for real.
What am I still doing here?
Why did I have to survive?
I'm useless. Can't even make a damn bomb!

For a moment there, I thought my life
might have some meaning, but...

'Cause you mean a lot to a lotta people.
So c'mon, man.

Never mind─I know.
Kinda obvious now I think about it.

World may be ending and all,
but a bombing's still a bombing.

That's part of it too, but mostly...
I was worried about you.
That bleeding heart... It'll getcha killed.
To know that I had a choice...
That this path─this world─was one I chose.
I wanted to take back my life.
Fate's got one twisted sense of humor...
But I'm sick of taking its shit!
This is my life. I make the rules!
Hey, why'd you pass on us?
You don't look like you're on a date...
Well, I don't think that's true at all.
Just have fun while you can, huh? Seeya.
Now, then... Where shall we go to next?
What's going on with this place─with you?
Alright. I'll tell you when we get to our spot. Okay?
It's one of my most favorite places.
Can I make it any more obvious?
How the hell am I supposed to choose!?
You want a piece of me!?
It was all you...wasn't it, Sephiroth?
I told you it was obvious.
Well, you'll have to give me a harder one next time.
At least I know now─where you and I stand, I mean.
Thing is, Cloud, I really like you.

But then...
"like" can mean a lotta different things, can't it?
But your mom gave that to you.

This isn't about me, though.
It's about saving the world─and you.
You really think that rift could swallow the planet whole?
Don't look up... Don't look up...
Bet Avalanche's screwed up the sky too.
Tomorrow isn't promised. If I get to wake up and see another dawn, well, that's enough for me.
Well, isn't that just perfect... Ugly thing in the sky got even bigger.
I'm gonna bite the bullet and tell her how I feel! I don't wanna have any regrets.
Wanted to spend my final days with the family, so I said to hell with work.
More time to get through my bucket list too.
People are saying the mako's just "dried up."
Dunno how much longer the suns'll stay on, if so.
It's our punishment for draining the planet of its mako. We only have ourselves to blame.
Let us accept it with humility, and in these final moments reflect on our sins.
We all bite the big one eventually. No reason not to live it up while we've still got time, right?
Why don't we all go camping? Might as well get some use out of the new car.
But...don't you have to go to work?
Not to worry. I already put in my resignation. I'm a free man now.
Why don't we make some sandwiches to take on the road?
Oh! I can lay out the meat!
Okay! Then I'll cut up the veggies.
I just want to give you two a taste of how big this world of ours is. Plus, we're long overdue for some quality family time.
Looking back, we sure did fight a lot, didn't we?
Anything left unsaid? Now's your chance to get it off your chest.
No matter what's going on in the world, one thing never changes: guy's gotta eat to survive. That's just the way it is.
I wish we could've gone out on a lot more dates.
...Sorry I was always so busy with work. But we still have a little time to make up for it.
Then let's hit up all the places we haven't been to yet!
So...what do you think's gonna happen to our baby?
I just wish we could've seen their face.
Hey... Let's give them a name.
We may not know what's gonna happen, but I wanna call them by their name at least.
...I like that. We'll give them a name, and we'll be a family.
...Always hoped I'd find that special someone before I bit the dust.
I dunno what it is, but something about that light... It scares the hell outta me.
Wait, you mean it? You should've said something sooner!
Aerith's in a wheelchair now? What happened?
Did she get caught up in that giant twister?
I dunno, but thankfully it sounds like she wasn't hurt too bad.
I hope she gets better soon. You could really use the help.
Yeah, you got that right. This place just isn't the same without her around.
Seriously. It's that special spice of hers that really gives the food its flavor.
Ain't that the truth! The marche stew practically tastes like mushy cardboard.
Come check out our clearance sale! Our way of saying thank you for all your patronage!
Everything must go! So don't wait; this could be your very last chance!
I can't stop wondering what's on the other side of that rift.
We've got freebies galore, folks! Come one, come all!
Treat you and yours to something special. But remember, only one per person!
Are you looking for a sweet treat to take your mind off things? We're giving away all our stock for free!
Help yourself to whatever you like! But hurry, because they're going fast!
One happy memory, comin' right up! Smile!
If this is gonna be our last picture together, I want it done by a pro.
I just hope I can put on a good smile...
Shinra will figure something out, right? I mean...they gotta.
Let's make it our best yet.
Shoulda taken more pics together while we had the chance.
I'm still going to work, personally. It just...gives me a way to take my mind off things.
I heard some people saying that a giant meteor is going to fall from the sky.
If only we'd listened to those planetology people... I suppose it's far too late for that now, though.
Can't afford to put off the bucket list any longer. No regrets, am I right?
I wonder if Avalanche has thrown in the towel. I mean, fighting Shinra isn't gonna do much at this point.
Maybe it was the tornado that tore open the sky, but who caused it? Avalanche.
I guess all the people who would remember us are gonna get wiped out too.
I feel like I'm stuck in a nightmare. None of this seems real.
Wish I could've gone to Costa del Sol, just once.
These days, every time I sleep, I dream about all the things I wish I'd done differently.
I used to get so hung up on the smallest stuff... Now I wish those were my only worries.
I have so much to be grateful for. A loving partner, wonderful children...
Feels like I'm the only one who can't stop staring at that thing.
I breathe a sigh of relief every morning I wake up. When you're living on borrowed time, you gotta be grateful.
Is it true? Have all the reactors stopped working? Was it Avalanche?
My fiancé died when the Sector 7 plate fell, so... Honestly, my life's been over ever since.
Could we all please stop fighting already?
I thought Avalanche was dead. Don't tell me there's more!
That's the spirit. Go on. Tear it all down!
Did that come from over by the church?
That's gotta be Avalanche again. Give us a break already!
That was the church, right? Of all the places─why?
What? Does Avalanche think we aren't terrified enough?
I don't think I could handle seeing any more bodies.
Is it true there was a riot?
Just blow it all up─put us out of our misery.
Can't we have a moment's peace?
Guess even the last few members of Avalanche are too much for Shinra.
The investigation into the strange rift that appeared above Midgar continues.
According to experts from Shinra's Research and Development division...
the radiation emitted by the rift has no effect whatsoever on the human body and is completely harmless.
Additionally, Director Heidegger of Public Security had this to say in regards to the growing fear that the planet's demise is imminent:
"We're doing everything in our power to determine the nature of this rift. Disregard any baseless speculation."
Tune in the day after tomorrow for our interview with the president, where we'll discuss the recent tornado...
as well as his plans to combat the rift.
I've heard some people say that the rift is proof that the planet's crying out in pain.
Has the planet finally forsaken us?
I mean, maybe? It's probably pissed that we squander its blessings and slaughter each other.
Can't blame it for being upset.
What do you think's gonna happen?
Dunno, but...I'm pretty sure it's out of our hands.
Only the planet can judge whether it's really worth letting us stick around.
How you gonna spend your final days?
Just keep living like I always have, I guess.
What? That's it? Don't you wanna try something you've never done before?
Well, I went to the church and prayed for the first time.
Or tried to. I just did what everybody else was doing. I think it helped.
I doubt even Shinra's gonna be able to come up with a solution for this.
Maybe we should go to Cosmo Canyon─see if they have any ideas.
It's a little late to be relying on planetology.
Besides, I bet all they'll do is tell you to pray or something.
Then what are we supposed to do?
Nothing. There's nothing we can do anymore.
I've lived a long and full life. So if my time on this planet comes to an end, I won't have any regrets.
But you all have only experienced a fraction of what our world has to offer. I'm so, so sorry, little ones.
Don't cry, Grandma. Please? You're gonna make me cry too!
Come on, everyone. It'll be okay.
What do you guys think's gonna happen to us?
Is that thing in the sky getting bigger!?
We don't gotta do homework, right?
Is there anything we can do to help?
Are we never gonna get to be grown-ups?
Ms. Folia is a dancer, you know.
For the longest time, she tried to keep her part-time work at the Honeybee Inn a secret.
But now she dances for the children so she can brighten their days.
I don't know what we'd do without her.
You were the guy with Aerith, right?
Hell with it! Let's just do what we want! Start by robbin' folks and stockin' up on gil.
Quit it. You're not fooling anyone.
Shut up! Once we're loaded, we can drown ourselves in booze!
Of course I am! Don't act like you're not!
Do not dare avert your eyes. See our mother's despair, inscribed upon the heavens!
Oh, how she cries! Her lamentations echoing from sea to sea!
Time grows short. Soon, our planet will breathe her last.
The lifestream is fading─drying up as we speak! And should our great mother fall, so too shall her children!
But it will be an ending we deserve. Our just deserts for our terrible ignorance!
Children of the planet! Behold the wound in the skies above─wrought by our hands!
Our mother is suffering, shrieking in pain at our unchecked cruelty!
Our wanton greed and endless strife are to blame!
We closed our ears to her cries, and believed ourselves immune to consequences. But now our judgment has come.
Guess there's no point goin' into work anymore, now is there?
Even if I did make it out, I've got nowhere to go.
Lotta good dates started right here...
My wife still hasn't come back yet...
If the trains're down, maybe they'll send a chopper for us.
I heard the corkscrew tunnel was pretty badly damaged.
There's no way more of the city's gonna come crashing down...right?
How am I supposed to take my mind off things if I can't bury myself in work?
Apparently, there are riots going on over in Sector 8.
Kinda wonder how that rift looks to all the folks topside.
How many partings and reunions has this station seen? Promises made and kept...
My boyfriend lives up on the plate, so this station holds a special place in our hearts.
How's my husband supposed to get back now?
The top of the Shinra Building was blown off?
It's just one thing after another these days. I mean, We can't take any more hits.
Did you hear? Shinra's gonna try to attack the rift.
All we can do is hope Shinra will come through for us. I mean, who else is there to turn to?
Is this our punishment for using too much mako?
If the trains aren't running, do you think we could get topside by walking along the tracks?
Don't be taken in by false rumors. I'd trust what Shinra says.
All service to the plate is suspended!
No word on when it will resume!
I repeat: service has been suspended.
Please wait for an announcement from the company!
All service to the plate is suspended!
This is all the information we have!
We do not know when service will resume!
Please wait for an announcement from the company!
Would you like a bowl of marche stew? The perfect blend of sweet and spicy!
All the fatty flavor and calories you need to get you through the day!
Try 'em with our sweet 'n' spicy sauce!
We've got the best spicy-sweet meatballs in all Midgar!
Our secret sauce is the authentic meatball sauce!
